name: presentation-generator-platform
description: AI-powered platform for automated presentation generation from existing slides

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../frontend-build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
